title: Looking for raked 5 team. primarily just ward skin, can be serious if needed
body:
I'm a Plat 2 adc main
Top 4 champs would be Jinx > Ashe > Ezreal > Draven 
IGN: Citizen Snipps

replies.body: I'm only silver 3, but need people to play ranked teams for the ward skin. Would you be keen?
Hey mate. if you already have a team with members ready to go. i'd be happy to join. send me an add on league.
